biotools.summary:
Predicting Hot Spot Residues at Protein-DNA Binding Interfaces Based on Sequence Information.

SPDH ├─conf #configuration file ├─datasets #All data │ ├─train_sequence #The sequence files used for the training set │ └─test_sequence #The sequence files used for the test set ├─feature #AAindex feature ├─model #model data file ├─outwhd #output file └─src #code folder.
